clinical_study.brief_title: Eculizumab Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics Study in Pediatric/Adolescent PNH Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label Multi Center Study of Eculizumab in Children and Adolescents With Diagnosis of Paroxysmal Nocturnal Hemoglobinuria

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to determine appropriate dose regimens of eculizumab in pediatric and/or adolescent patients with paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH).

detailed_description.textblock:
This was an open label, multicenter study of eculizumab administered intravenously (IV) to approximately 6 to 8 pediatric and adolescent patients aged 2-17 years with PNH.
Planned duration of treatment was 12 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Serum trough and peak concentrations of eculizumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Serum trough and peak concentrations of eculizumab

arm_group.description: Eculizumab administered intravenously for 12 weeks.
